author: #s#8059
description: Logs any DMs sent to the bot to a csv file. Note that the csv file is delimited with semicolons!
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog! Note that there are a few subtleties that may be important:
1. The cog uses semicolons as delimiter. This may cause issues with some programs that read CSV files.
2. It is possible to automatically make the bot owner DM the logs after x messages have been sent.
short: Logs any DMs sent to the bot to a csv file.
name: DMLogger
